name: LuxFall
description:
Fall, collect darkness, and avoid peril.

-----

This is the first game I've ever developed/released.  It was a great learning experience. I had a lot of ideas for additional functionality I want to add to this game, but I ran out of time for the weekly game jam.   Anyway, hope you enjoy.

-----

Made for Weekly Game Jam #180
Theme "Downgrade"
